## Information

- **Problem ID:** *e.g. 1C*
- **Hacked Submission ID(s):** *e.g. http://8.136.99.126/record/67ac8ea63dd657109df8a7ac*

## Hack Reason

*Example: The solution is incorrect when N is equal to 2!*

## Input/Generator

*Example 1:*

```plain
2 2 1 1
1 1
1 1
```

*Example 2:*

```cpp
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	freopen("45.in", "w", stdout);
	puts("2 2 1 1");
	puts("1 1");
	puts("1 1");
	return 0;
}
```
